name: Marked by King Bs
description:
I really wanted to live as an ordinary student.

Until I met those boys…!!!!


I got related with the King Bs with the wrong choices I made!


The F**Kdere, who is scarier than the Tsundere, forces me to sit with him,

my childhood friend, who pretends not to know me, saying it's an embarrassment,

and one who calls himself a 'Good Hitter', threatens me with his baseball bat…


"Oh... Why am I having such a bad day? T^T
O, of course I'm not talking about you guys… (Shriveling)"


A story where I tried to get rid of one but 5 came along!

A Manic Snack Slave Romance!




With these totally different characteristics,

…Can we get closer?
